name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Namast - New tab that fits you

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace and organise your new tab page and shape it exactly to your needs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New tabs are central in your daily browsing. Namast allows you to create a new tab page that fits your needs.

Many widgets are available to custom your new tab: 
- Time: display time, date and calendar where you want, like you want. 
- Weather: without moving from your desk, check the current weather and the forecast in your city in a snap. 
- Top sites: visit your top visited websites in one click.
- Quotes: be inspired by quotes from top tier people and become one tomorrow.
- Background: a new tab page, can't be a great new tab without a beautiful and inspiring background. 
- To-do list (coming soon): still in our to do list, but will ready for you soon.
- And more to come...

All your recommendations and ideas are welcome. Do not hesitate to ask us for new widgets, features or just for encourage us by using Namast.
